text: The Tashi Group is the largest privately owned conglomerate of companies in Bhutan. It was founded in 1959 in Phuentsholing, Bhutan. Tashi Group has over 40 subsidiaries including Tashi Air (Bhutan Airlines), Tashi Infocomm, T-Bank, Druk School, etc. Tashi Group, the largest private company in Bhutan, operates a chemical plant, a ferrosilicon plant and a soft drinks bottling factory.Tashi Group == References == == External links == * Official Tashi Group website Category:Companies of Bhutan Category:Chukha District Category:Conglomerate companies established in 1959 Category:1959 establishments in Bhutan
title: Tashi Group
